main.name: Akshay S M
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe JavaScript & Typescript
main.bio: I have 9 years of professional experience in Web Development as a Full-stack Developer and experienced Front-end Developer with a strong background in Agile methodologies, specializing in the development of engaging and user-friendly web and mobile applications. Proficient in Typescript,JavaScript and experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams including Product Owners, UX designers, and architects throughout the software development lifecycle. Skilled in technical design, mentorship, and pair-programming, with a commitment to continuous learning and professional growth. Demonstrated expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and responsive web design principles, alongside proficiency in CSS technologies such as PostCSS, SASS, and SCSS. Experienced in utilizing JavaScript build tools and module bundlers for efficient development workflows. Knowledgeable in UX/UI design principles and experienced in collaborating closely with designers to create visually appealing interfaces. Familiar with testing frameworks and libraries for ensuring code quality and maintainability, including Vitest, Jest, Playwright, and Cypress. Proficient in state management with Vuex and experienced in writing clean and maintainable code using TypeScript and the Composition API. Experienced in component-driven development using Storybook and adept at effective collaboration within Agile/Scrum methodologies, prioritizing teamwork and stakeholder engagement.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me if you want me to help you create a dashing web application or mobile application

work.title: UI/UX Technical Lead
work.description: As a Technical Leader at Wipro, I lead a dynamic team of developers in driving innovation and excellence in frontend development. testimonials.text: Akshay is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Akshay has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
